## Inline code

* `vignette("pkgdown")`

* `?template_navbar`

## Spurious links

These shouldn't be linked.

* `Authors@R`
* `content-home.html`
* `toc: depth`
* `x = y`

## Code blocks

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Shouldn't get linked
enlist(5)
# Should get linked
MASS::enlist(5)
```

```{r}
library(MASS)
enlist(5)
```

```{r}
# Should get linked because MASS was loaded previously
enlist(5)
```
